mapper.select: select transaction_category.id as type_id, transaction_category.value as type_value, transaction_category.icon as type_icon from user join user_record_type on user.id = user_record_type.user_id join transaction_category on user_record_type.type_id = transaction_category.id where user.id = #{userId};
